actionCalls.description: Send email to the customer using email alert and bank statement auto email (email template).
actionCalls.name: Email_Customer
actionCalls.label: Email Customer

actionCalls.description: Sends an email to contact when a case gets created.
actionCalls.name: Fund_return_email_to_customer
actionCalls.label: Fund return email to customer

actionCalls.name: ID_and_Address_Verification_Email_to_Customer
actionCalls.label: ID and Address Verification Email to Customer

actionCalls.description: Email alert to customer when there is no ID presented during the on-boarding process.
actionCalls.name: NoID_Email_to_customer
actionCalls.label: NoID Email to customer

decisions.description: Check whether the event is coming from AML or Cloudcheck.
decisions.name: Check_Event_Source
decisions.label: Check Event Source

rules.name: AML_CC_Fail
rules.conditionLogic: (2 AND 3 AND 1) OR 4 OR ( 5 AND 6 ) OR 7 OR ( 8 AND 9 ) OR ( 10 AND 11 )
rules.label: CC Fail/AML With No Transaction/Account Close

rules.name: If_D14
rules.conditionLogic: ( 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 ) OR ( 5 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 )
rules.label: D12 / D14

rules.name: Rule_Id_O5
rules.label: Rule Id O5, O1, O6, O7, O8

Flow.description: Create case when AML rules violated. Onboarding email alerts reconnected.
Flow.label: AML Case Creation Flow

recordCreates.description: Create case according to D1 AML rule type.
recordCreates.name: Create_Case
recordCreates.label: Create Case

recordCreates.description: Create a potential person account from transactiondata.
recordCreates.name: Create_Potential_customer
recordCreates.label: Create Potential customer

recordCreates.description: Create transactions based on AML rule violation event data.
recordCreates.name: Create_Transaction
recordCreates.label: Create Transaction

recordLookups.description: Get account where on boarding Id or customer Id match from platform event to customer/Onboarding Id
recordLookups.name: Get_Account
recordLookups.label: Get Account

recordLookups.description: Get contact id to link with the returned transaction.
recordLookups.name: Get_Contact
recordLookups.label: Get Contact

recordLookups.description: Get potential record type from person-account.
recordLookups.name: Get_Customer_record_type
recordLookups.label: Get Customer record type

recordLookups.description: Get custom metadata object where rule ID match with record name
recordLookups.name: Get_Rule_MDT
recordLookups.label: Get Rule MDT

recordLookups.description: Get Return Deposits Transaction(asset) record type
recordLookups.name: Get_Transaction_record_type
recordLookups.label: Get Transaction record-type

recordLookups.description: Gate transaction record to link with the case.
recordLookups.name: Get_Transection
recordLookups.label: Get Transection

recordUpdates.description: Update case record to indicate that the email has been sent to customer.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Case_Record_with_Email_Sent
recordUpdates.label: Update Case Record with 'Email Sent'

recordUpdates.description: Update bank provided name and time stamp in customer record.
recordUpdates.name: Update_registered_customer
recordUpdates.label: Update registered customer

variables.description: Stores the newly created case Id.
variables.name: NewCaseID

variables.description: Variable stores the newly created case ID.
variables.name: NewlyCreatedCaseId
